amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to take any action to prevent a State from implementing any law that makes it lawful to possess, distribute, or use cannabidiol or cannabidiol oil.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to take any action to prevent a State from implementing any law that makes it lawful to possess, distribute, or use cannabidiol oil.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 297 - 130 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 297 - 130 (Roll no. 286).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Perry.
